ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Declining to Refer Back to the CRTC Decision CRTC 2009-673
PrecisOrder declining to refer back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) Decision CRTC 2009-673 of October 27, 2009 for reconsideration and hearing with respect to the application by the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation for a broadcasting licence.
